name: Snake Jump
description:
Snake Jump is a third-person vertical platformer without checkpoints where you play as a snake. From down in the jungle you will go on an adventure, conquer obstacles and complete a thrilling parcour. Try to climb various obstacles to see what heights you can reach as a snake. The goal? Simple. Reach the goal of the obstacle cours and a beautiful mystery awaits you! How far can you go? Find out and see.

Don't want to go on this journey alone? No problem! Play with up to five friends and take on this adventure together!

Snake Jump can be played on keyboard and mouse or any controller.
